Title: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Bloody Inscription
Writer: Arthur Conan Doyle (novel), Yuli Dunsky, Valeri Frid
Actors: Vasiliy Livanov, Vitali Solomin, Rina Zelyonaya, Borislav Brondukov
Plot: When a murder happens with a bloody inscription and a ring left behind, puzzled Scotland Yard detectives go to Sherlock Holmes for help.
